Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photo of Joe Biden and Gretchen Whitmer without masks was taken before the first cases of COVID-19 emerged in Michigan.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by implying that Biden and Whitmer were being hypocritical and not following mask mandates while children were being forced to wear masks during outdoor sports.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that Biden and Whitmer were actually at the Detroit Athletic Club without masks during the time when children were mandated to wear masks during outdoor sports.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photo is recent and that Biden and Whitmer were not following mask mandates, which is a problematic assumption based on the evidence provided.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that the photo was taken before the COVID-19 pandemic and mask mandates were in place.
